_header: Waste bringeth a kingdome in need

CULFf238.First Lines:
Wast bryngyth a kyngdome in nedeNede makyth a man to
                    trauayleThe more trauayle þe more medeSo he do by goode
                    counsayle…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…And takeþ hys frendys good aȝeyn ryȝtTo fende
                    hym ther with aȝens hys foo
CULFf238.Attributed Title:
Here…begynnyth þe prouerbis of Salamon (f. 10ra);
                    Here endyth þe prouerbys of Salamon… (f. 14va)

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Waste makes a kyngdome in nedeAnd nede makes a man to trauayle…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …And charyte in herte to holdeThat we may wynn of blysse þe crowne
BLAdd31042.Note: 38 stanzas, only 21 of which appear in Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Ff.2.38 and Cambridge UK,  Magdalene College Pepys 1584. Ends, “Amen.”
